title: S’pore and Malaysia update RTS plans, agree to collaborate more on anti-drug enforcement and health
description: Malaysian Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim arrived in Singapore to meet PM Lawrence Wong for the 12th Singapore-Malaysia Leaders’ Retreat to enhance cooperation. Read more at straitstimes.com. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:
SINGAPORE Singapore and Malaysia have inked an additional deal on the Johor Bahru-Singapore Rapid Transit System (RTS) Link. 
The two countries will also conduct more joint activities and exercises … [+4783 chars]
